cosmicopal.FolkToolsLetter1: The air in the valley has grown thick with things unseen. Take this key to open your eyes.^-The Watcher %item object (O)cosmicopal.HagStone 1 %%
cosmicopal.FolkToolsLetter2: Nature does not hide its bounty from those who feel its pull.^-The Watcher %item object (O)cosmicopal.DowsingRod 1 %%
cosmicopal.FolkToolsLetter3: There are voices on the wind. Let their chime be your shield.^-The Watcher %item object (O)cosmicopal.WitchBells 1 %%
cosmicopal.FolkToolsLetter4: Crafting schematic for an Ancient Cauldron.^-The Watcher %item craftingRecipe cosmicopal.Cauldron %%
cosmicopal.FolkToolsLetter5: The spirits act in ways we cannot always see.^-The Watcher %item craftingRecipe cosmicopal.SpiritAltar %%
